mapper.insert: insert into service_type (SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_NBR, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceTypeNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parServiceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{extServiceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceTypeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update service_type set
SERVICE_TYPE_NBR = #{serviceTypeNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_TYPE_NAME = #{serviceTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{parServiceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EXT_SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{extServiceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERVICE_TYPE_DESC = #{serviceTypeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_NBR, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service_type

select SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_NBR, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service_type where SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_NBR, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service_type where PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{parServiceTypeId}

select SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_NBR, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME, PAR_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, EXT_SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from service_type where 1=1
and SERVICE_TYPE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{serviceTypeName}),'%')
order by UPDATE_DATE desc
